ModMetaData.name: Kerberos : Protect Gears and Firearms
ModMetaData.author: BlackMarket420
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the protect gears and firearms from the kerberos saga. This mod contains the following...
- Panzer cop protect gears "Jin Roh: The Wolf Brigade" - Panzer cop protect gears "Stray Dog: Kerberos Panzer Cops" - Panzer cop protect gears "Inrang: The Wolf Brigade" - Panzer cop protect gears "Kerberos Panzer Jager" - Kerberos combat shield - Kerberos tower shield - MG 34 - MG 42 - Mauser C96 - STG 44 - Grenade Launcher Pistol
